title: India's AI Prowess: Driving Productivity and Innovation Globally
description: India's strategic advantage lies in its capacity to deploy artificial intelligence solutions worldwide, enhancing productivity and innovation across sectors. Electronics and IT Secretary, S Krishnan, emphasized AI's crucial role in realizing India's 'Viksit Bharat' vision by 2047. AI can significantly improve agriculture, healthcare, and service quality.
content:
India's technological capability, particularly in artificial intelligence (AI), presents a unique opportunity for global influence in productivity and innovation, according to Electronics and Information Technology Secretary S Krishnan.

title: Baba Vanga's dire 2026 predictions: A war in the East that will destroy the West, the Lord of the World, and encounters with aliens
description: Baba Vanga's prophecies for 2026 paint a dire picture, foreseeing a major war originating in the East, devastating natural disasters impacting a significant portion of Earth's landmass, and artificial intelligence surpassing human control. Her predictions also include humanity's first verified contact with extraterrestrial life, presenting a stark warning about the future.
content:

title: Data, not algorithms, is true power behind artificial intelligence
description: The authors report that the overwhelming majority of respondents identified data quality, rather than model sophistication, as the most critical factor influencing AI system performance. Errors, omissions, and inconsistencies in datasets ripple through the entire pipeline, undermining fairness, transparency, and reliability. This recognition marks a significant shift in how the AI community is beginning to value the human and procedural dimensions of data work.
content: A new international study has revealed that the real foundation of artificial intelligence lies not in algorithms or model architectures, but in the quality, governance, and ethics of data itself. The research offers rare insight into how leading AI ... [7101 chars]

title: Super Micro Projects Surprise Revenue Miss on Later Deliveries
description: Super Micro Computer Inc., which emerged as a favorite stock among artificial intelligence-obsessed investors last year, unexpectedly issued first-quarter guidance on Thursday that fell far short of Wall Street’s expectations.

title: Mayor's plan to jumpstart AI revolution in the West Midlands announced during Tech Week
description: The Mayor of the West Midlands, Richard Parker, has outlined plans to make the region a national leader in the UK’s artificial intelligence (AI) revolution.

title: Lumen and Palantir team up to accelerate enterprise AI adoption
description: Lumen has agreed to spend more than $200 million on Palantir software over a period of several years. The partnership will integrate Palantir's foundry and Artificial Intelligence platform with Lumen's connectivity fabric, a digital networking solution.
